# Verify that not calling an endpoint is caught by the parser
! parse
err 'cannot reference API endpoint one.One without calling it'

-- one/one.go --
package one

import (
    "context"
)

//encore:api public
func One(ctx context.Context) error {
    return nil
}

-- two/two.go --
package two

import (
    "context"

    "test/one"
)

//encore:api public
func Foo(ctx context.Context) error {
    f := one.One
    f()
    return nil
}

-- want: errors --
